New Records: Karl-Anthony Towns is averaging an impressive 29 points and 14 rebounds in his last five games
Key Match Events: The Knicks held Milwaukee's dynamic duo to a combined 43 points and limited them to 0-for-5 from beyond the arc
The Knicks scored 21 fast break points, marking their second-highest total this season
Pre-Game Insights: The Knicks should consider incorporating a strategy centered around Karl-Anthony Towns early in their game plan this season
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks have returned to a.500 record, and they have no days off ahead

Towns playing like an All-NBA talent while Anunoby locks down an opposing team's best player is only one of the variations of attack New York presents with this treasure chest of a roster when healthy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks are currently ranked 24th in transition points this season
OG Anunoby's ability to switch onto Damian Lillard showcased some of the best perimeter defense in the league
Others: Jalen Brunson has shot 41% from the floor and 28% from beyond the arc over the last three games for New York
The Knicks' next six games are against teams with records below.500
